Advanced API Testing Examples > Pagination and Filtering
Advanced API Testing Examples > Authentication and Headers
Mock different responses for different endpoints
Mock API to simulate rate limiting
Combining API Tests with UI Testing
Verify API data matches UI display
Test UI with different API states
Mock users API - load from JSON file
Mock posts API - with custom data
GET /posts - should return list of posts
GET /posts/:id - should return a specific post
GET /posts?userId=:userId - should filter posts by user
POST /posts - should create a new post
PATCH /posts/:id - should partially update a post
GET /users - should return list of users
GET /users/:id - should return a specific user
POST /users - should create a new user
PATCH /users/:id - should partially update a user
GET /users/:id - should return 404 for non-existent user
Testing search on playwright documentation page
